title: France panorama. [No. 75/07]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: The mole - a regional express metro line of Paris nearing completion. The tortoise - for underwater nuclear-medium use. 2. Ground flyers - flight simulators. 3. The poet’s club - for lovers of poetry. 4. The arts - Jean Marchand, author, alias “Mercator”, painter.
